name: A Road Rage Game
description:
You are an angry driver wanting to overtake every single car on the road. Even if it means rear-ending them or spinning them out!

Your tyres have the grip of soap on a mirror

This is an early university project. Don't take it seriously

Use arrows to move the car. 

Smash or spin the other cars out.

Press escape to make the program freeze up. Refresh the page with F5
